fields.description:
In ListMultipartUploadsResult {{<KeyMarker/>}} and {{<UploadIdMarker/>}} are not present,

{noformat}
<ListMultipartUploadsResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/">
  <Bucket>euca9097test</Bucket>
  <NextKeyMarker>testmpupload</NextKeyMarker>
  <NextUploadIdMarker>VJ2SEETPIKLAROZHNBJ8M5HUEUU8GR24XAF9RRNQUHUZSVQFHVICCK1VONUNGOAQ</NextUploadIdMarker>
  <MaxUploads>1000</MaxUploads>
  <IsTruncated>false</IsTruncated>
  <Upload>
    <Key>testmpupload</Key>
    <UploadId>VJ2SEETPIKLAROZHNBJ8M5HUEUU8GR24XAF9RRNQUHUZSVQFHVICCK1VONUNGOAQ</UploadId>
    <Initiator>
      <ID>AIDXLAZRGT9NM4LXWYNQY</ID>
      <DisplayName>admin</DisplayName>
    </Initiator>
    <Owner>
      <ID>34b22304d243f24623c4034353e1b5a451b531c58604bf2b36212f301393231d</ID>
      <DisplayName>eucalyptus</DisplayName>
    </Owner>
    <StorageClass>STANDARD</StorageClass>
    <Initiated>2014-05-21T22:09:09.676Z</Initiated>
  </Upload>
</ListMultipartUploadsResult>
{noformat}
fields.summary: <KeyMarker/> and <UploadIdMarker/> is not present in ListMultipartUploadsResult

comments.body:
Fix for this issue should be fairly straightforward, the missing elements should be copied from the request to the response in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/blob/testing/clc/modules/object-storage/src/main/java/com/eucalyptus/objectstorage/ObjectStorageGateway.java#L1940. 

I don't think this is super critical, it can be targeted for 4.0.1

Other issues found in listing multipart uploads: 

-Listings for the same key are not ordered lexicographically by the upload ID
-UploadIdMarker and MaxUploads are not bound correctly in the messages
-UploadIdMarker is not honored correctly
-NextKeyMarker and NextUploadIdMarker are missing from the response when they are not included in the request

Fixes for all these issues are in a private branch.

Tested using s3curl, sample requests and responses are as follows:

- KeyMarker, UploadIdMarker, NextKeyMarker and NextUploadIdMarker elements are always present in the response.
{noformat}
# s3curl.pl --id admin_41 -- "http://10.111.1.41:8773/services/objectstorage/testbucket?uploads" 
# <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ListMultipartUploadsResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/">
  <Bucket>testbucket</Bucket>
  <KeyMarker/>
  <UploadIdMarker/>
  <NextKeyMarker/>
  <NextUploadIdMarker/>
  <MaxUploads>1000</MaxUploads>
  <IsTruncated>false</IsTruncated>
</ListMultipartUploadsResult>
{noformat}

- Ordered listing by keys first and uploadIds next. Initiator ID element is set to user ARN 
{noformat}
# s3curl.pl --id admin_41 -- "http://10.111.1.41:8773/services/objectstorage/testbucket?uploads" 
# <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ListMultipartUploadsResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/">
  <Bucket>testbucket</Bucket>
  <KeyMarker/>
  <UploadIdMarker/>
  <NextKeyMarker>xkey</NextKeyMarker>
  <NextUploadIdMarker>W4NRLHDXB19UIWYUXBPKVXHUVYNZ5APRJ30QMQ80QZGBC83LMYGTFWCBTGBVB8WJ</NextUploadIdMarker>
  <MaxUploads>1000</MaxUploads>
  <IsTruncated>false</IsTruncated>
  <Upload>
    <Key>akey</Key>
    <UploadId>GT1JIXJE2VRUROFOAHFNNVKH67PNJDX9ISHVV20363SI7NXMIZ7BT7TYRTOPU5XK</UploadId>
    <Initiator>
      <ID>arn:aws:iam::177176717239:user/admin</ID>
      <DisplayName>admin</DisplayName>
    </Initiator>

    </Owner>

</ListMultipartUploadsResult>

- upload-id-marker and max-uploads are bound and evaluated correctly. Corrected the listing when both key-marker and upload-id-marker are set in the request
{noformat}
# s3curl.pl --id admin_41 -- "http://10.111.1.41:8773/services/objectstorage/testbucket?uploads&key-marker=bkey&upload-id-marker=8ARSTMEXHPYL0DLQXBT3BQPWAECRSGRBUQ8SAL9SVWNLCKVJNG33YWSTVKZXZTPH&max-uploads=2"
# <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ListMultipartUploadsResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/">
  <Bucket>testbucket</Bucket>
  <KeyMarker>bkey</KeyMarker>
  <UploadIdMarker>8ARSTMEXHPYL0DLQXBT3BQPWAECRSGRBUQ8SAL9SVWNLCKVJNG33YWSTVKZXZTPH</UploadIdMarker>
  <NextKeyMarker>xkey</NextKeyMarker>
  <NextUploadIdMarker>2BSJVMFX77PQCZCQ4GF1SBKAMSATBCYX7HCVO1UTQIB7OCKETLV5PVTC42PQFDFS</NextUploadIdMarker>
  <MaxUploads>2</MaxUploads>
  <IsTruncated>true</IsTruncated>
  <Upload>
    <Key>bkey</Key>
    <UploadId>OMSBDCTLIIVTXNUNOF4Q40I7BXT5ZXXQ3N9LNISSTDRKCBUFW58LFKLXNGSCX9F2</UploadId>

</ListMultipartUploadsResult>
{noformat}

Verified. Tested with both boto and s3curl.
